rules_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, it connives 2 as long as you have at least five different mana values among cards in your graveyard. [i](To have a creature connive, draw two cards, then discard two cards. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each nonland card discarded this way.)[/i]
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
